attributes.action: Legalise cannabis for medical and recreationly.
attributes.additional_details: Legalizing cannabis medically and recreationally will expand NHS access, reduce costs for patients, and regulate safe use. It will end unfair criminalization, save £50M in enforcement, and generate £1-3B in tax revenue. Regulated markets, like Canada’s, ensure quality and weaken crime. With 72% public support, it’s time for the UK to act, respecting choice and reducing harm. Let's keep up with the modern world alit of countries have don't it, they've saved money and money.
attributes.background: We urge the UK Government and Parliament to fully legalize cannabis for both medical and recreational use, implementing a regulated framework to ensure safety, accessibility, and economic benefits.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735447
